mapper.sql: pio.pay_in_order_id as order_id ,pio.ctime as ctime,pio.amount as amount,fuo.user_id as user_id,uc.user_name as user_name ,piod.product_name as product_name ,pio.`status` as order_status
mapper.select: select count(1) from pay_in_order as pio left join f_user_order as fuo on pio.pay_in_order_id = fuo.pay_in_order_id left join ucenter_user as uc on fuo.user_id = uc.user_id left join pay_in_order_detail as piod on pio.pay_in_order_id = piod.pay_in_order_id
